00059     ActorRigid::ActorRigid (Real mass, String name, String file, String group) : ActorBase (name, file, group)
00060     {
00061         this->CreateMotionState(this->node);
00062         this->CreateRigidObject(mass);
00063         ActorType=ActorBase::Actorrigid;
00064     }
00065 
00066     ActorRigid::~ActorRigid ()
00067     {
00068         delete physrigidbody;
00069         CollisionObject = NULL;
00070     }
00071 
00072     void ActorRigid::CreateRigidObject (Real pmass)
00073     {
00074         btScalar bmass=pmass;
00075         this->physrigidbody = new btRigidBody (bmass, this->MotionState, this->Shape);
00076         CollisionObject=physrigidbody;
00077         CollisionObject->setUserPointer(this);
00078         if(0.0 == bmass)
00079         {
00080             CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(btCollisionObject::CF_STATIC_OBJECT);
00081         }
00082     }
00083 
00084     void ActorRigid::PerformConvexDecomposition(unsigned int depth, float cpercent, float ppercent)
00085     {
00086         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00087         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00088         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00089         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00090 
00091         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00092         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00093         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00094 
00095         unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00096         Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00097         unsigned int* indices = new unsigned int[indexData->indexCount];
00098         unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00099         float* pReal = NULL;
00100         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00101         {
00102             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00103             vertices[j].x = *pReal++;
00104             vertices[j].y = *pReal++;
00105             vertices[j].z = *pReal++;
00106         }
00107         vBuffer->unlock();
00108         size_t index_offset = 0;
00109         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00110 
00111         unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00112         unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00113 
00114         if (use32bitindexes)
00115         {
00116             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00117             {
00118                 indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00119             }
00120         }
00121         else
00122         {
00123             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00124             {
00125                 indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00126             }
00127         }
00128         iBuffer->unlock();
00129 
00130         ConvexDecomposition::DecompDesc desc;
00131         desc.mVcount = vertexData->vertexCount;
00132         desc.mTcount = triCount;
00133         desc.mVertices = &vertices[0].x;
00134         desc.mIndices = &indices[0];
00135         unsigned int maxv  = 16;
00136         float skinWidth    = 0.0;
00137         desc.mDepth        = depth;
00138                 desc.mCpercent     = cpercent;
00139                 desc.mPpercent     = ppercent;
00140                 desc.mMaxVertices  = maxv;
00141                 desc.mSkinWidth    = skinWidth;
00142 
00143         internal::PhysConvexDecomposition decomp;
00144         desc.mCallback = &decomp;
00145 
00146         ConvexBuilder cb(desc.mCallback);
00147         cb.process(desc);
00148 
00149         btCompoundShape* compound = new btCompoundShape(false);
00150         btTransform trans;
00151         trans.setIdentity();
00152         for (int i=0;i<decomp.m_convexShapes.size();i++)
00153         {
00154             btVector3 centroid = decomp.m_convexCentroids[i];
00155             trans.setOrigin(centroid);
00156             btConvexHullShape* convexShape = decomp.m_convexShapes[i];
00157             compound->addChildShape(trans,convexShape);
00158         }
00159         Shape=compound;
00160         ShapeIsSaved = false;
00161         this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00162 
00163         delete[] vertices;
00164         delete[] indices;
00165 
00166         return;
00167     }

00169     void ActorRigid::AddObjectToWorld (World *TargetWorld)
00170     {
00171         TargetWorld->GetPhysicsManager()->GetPhysicsWorldPointer()->addRigidBody(this->physrigidbody);
00172         //TargetWorld->Physics->BulletDynamicsWorld->addRigidBody(this->physrigidbody);
00173         this->AttachToGraphics();
00174     }
00175 
00176     void ActorRigid::RemoveObjectFromWorld(World* TargetWorld)
00177     {
00178         TargetWorld->GetPhysicsManager()->GetPhysicsWorldPointer()->removeRigidBody(this->physrigidbody);
00179         //TargetWorld->Physics->BulletDynamicsWorld->removeRigidBody(this->physrigidbody);
00180         this->DetachFromGraphics();
00181     }

00183     void ActorRigid::CreateShapeFromMeshDynamic(short unsigned int accuracy)
00184     {
00185         if(accuracy==1)
00186         {
00187             if(!ShapeIsSaved)
00188             {
00189                 delete Shape;
00190             }
00191             /// @todo - Check for thread safety
00192             btConvexShape *tmpshape = new btConvexTriangleMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh());
00193             btShapeHull *hull = new btShapeHull(tmpshape);
00194             btScalar margin = tmpshape->getMargin();
00195             hull->buildHull(margin);
00196             tmpshape->setUserPointer(hull);
00197             btConvexHullShape* convexShape = new btConvexHullShape();
00198             for (int b=0;b<hull->numVertices();b++)
00199             {
00200                 convexShape->addPoint(hull->getVertexPointer()[b]);
00201             }
00202             delete tmpshape;
00203             delete hull;
00204             btScalar mass=this->physrigidbody->getInvMass();
00205             mass=1/mass;
00206             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00207             convexShape->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00208             Shape = convexShape;
00209             ShapeIsSaved = false;
00210             this->Shape->setLocalScaling(btVector3(1.0,1.0,1.0));
00211             this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00212             this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00213             this->physrigidbody->updateInertiaTensor();
00214             return;
00215         }
00216         if(accuracy==2)
00217         {
00218             if(!ShapeIsSaved)
00219             {
00220                 delete Shape;
00221             }
00222             int depth=5;
00223             float cpercent=5;
00224             float ppercent=15;
00225             this->PerformConvexDecomposition(depth,cpercent,ppercent);
00226 
00227             btScalar mass=this->physrigidbody->getInvMass();
00228             mass=1/mass;
00229             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00230             Shape->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00231             this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00232             this->physrigidbody->updateInertiaTensor();
00233             return;
00234         }
00235         if(accuracy==3)
00236         {
00237             if(!ShapeIsSaved)
00238             {
00239                 delete Shape;
00240             }
00241             int depth=7;
00242             float cpercent=5;
00243             float ppercent=10;
00244             this->PerformConvexDecomposition(depth,cpercent,ppercent);
00245 
00246             btScalar mass=this->physrigidbody->getInvMass();
00247             mass=1/mass;
00248             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00249             Shape->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00250             this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00251             this->physrigidbody->updateInertiaTensor();
00252             return;
00253         }
00254         if(accuracy==4)
00255         {
00256             if(!ShapeIsSaved)
00257             {
00258                 delete Shape;
00259             }
00260             btGImpactMeshShape* gimpact = new btGImpactMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh());
00261             btScalar mass=this->physrigidbody->getInvMass();
00262             mass=1/mass;
00263             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00264             gimpact->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00265             gimpact->setLocalScaling(btVector3(1.f,1.f,1.f));
00266             gimpact->setMargin(0.04);
00267             gimpact->updateBound();
00268             Shape=gimpact;
00269             ShapeIsSaved = false;
00270             this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00271             this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00272             this->physrigidbody->updateInertiaTensor();
00273             return;
00274         }
00275         return;
00276     }
00277 
00278     void ActorRigid::CreateSphereShapeFromMesh()
00279     {
00280         Vector3 test;
00281         test.ExtractOgreVector3(this->entity->getMesh()->getBounds().getSize());
00282         if(test.X==test.Y && test.Y==test.Z)
00283         {
00284             if(!ShapeIsSaved)
00285             {
00286                 delete Shape;
00287             }
00288             Real radius=test.X*0.5;
00289             btSphereShape* sphereshape = new btSphereShape(radius);
00290             btScalar mass=this->physrigidbody->getInvMass();
00291             mass=1/mass;
00292             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00293             sphereshape->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00294             Shape = sphereshape;
00295             ShapeIsSaved = false;
00296             this->Shape->setLocalScaling(btVector3(1.f,1.f,1.f));
00297             this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00298             this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00299             this->physrigidbody->updateInertiaTensor();
00300             return;
00301         }
00302         else
00303         {
00304             return;
00305         }
00306     }
00307 
00308     void ActorRigid::CreateShapeFromMeshStatic()
00309     {
00310         if(!ShapeIsSaved)
00311         {
00312             delete Shape;
00313         }
00314         /// @todo - Check for thread safety
00315         btBvhTriangleMeshShape *tmpshape = new btBvhTriangleMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh(),true);
00316         this->Shape=tmpshape;
00317         ShapeIsSaved = false;
00318         this->Shape->setLocalScaling(btVector3(1.0,1.0,1.0));
00319         this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00320         this->physrigidbody->updateInertiaTensor();
00321     }

00332         return;

00367     void ActorRigid::RestoreActivation()

00369         this->physrigidbody->forceActivationState(ACTIVE_TAG);
00370                 this->physrigidbody->setDeactivationTime( 0.f );
